Title: Heat-conducting, compressible mixtures with multicomponent diffusion: Construction of a weak solution
Abstract: © 2015 Society for Industrial and Applied Mathematics.We investigate a coupling between the compressible Navier'stokes-Fourier system and the full Maxwell'stefan equations. This model describes the motion of a chemically reacting heat-conducting gaseous mixture. The viscosity coefficients are density-dependent functions vanishing in a vacuum and the internal pressure depends on species concentrations. By several levels of approximation we prove the global-in-time existence of weak solutions on the three-dimensional torus.
